<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension"></a>

# OpenXRRenderModelExtension

**Inherits:** [OpenXRExtensionWrapper](OpenXRExtensionWrapper.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

This class implements the OpenXR Render Model Extension.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class implements the OpenXR Render Model Extension, if enabled it will maintain a list of active render models and provides an interface to the render model data.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-signal -->

**render_model_added**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_signal_render_model_added)

Emitted when a new render model is added.

<!-- classref-signal -->

Emitted when the top level path associated with a render model changed.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_is_active"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_active**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_is_active)

Returns ``true`` if OpenXR's render model extension is supported and enabled.

\ **Note:** This only returns a valid value after OpenXR has been initialized.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_create"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **render_model_create**\ (\ render_model_id\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_create)

Creates a render model object within OpenXR using a render model id.

\ **Note:** This function is exposed for dependent OpenXR extensions that provide render model ids to be used with the render model extension.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_destroy"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **render_model_destroy**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_destroy)

Destroys a render model object within OpenXR that was previously created with [render_model_create()](OpenXRRenderModelExtension.md#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_create).

\ **Note:** This function is exposed for dependent OpenXR extensions that provide render model ids to be used with the render model extension.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_all"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[RID](RID.md)\] **render_model_get_all**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_all)

Returns an array of all currently active render models registered with this extension.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **render_model_get_animatable_node_count**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_count)

Returns the number of animatable nodes this render model has.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **render_model_get_animatable_node_name**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md), index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_name)

Returns the name of the given animatable node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform3D](Transform3D.md) **render_model_get_animatable_node_transform**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md), index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_transform)

Returns the current local transform for an animatable node. This is updated every frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_confidence"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[TrackingConfidence](XRPose.md#enum_XRPose_TrackingConfidence) **render_model_get_confidence**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_confidence)

Returns the tracking confidence of the tracking data for the render model.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_root_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform3D](Transform3D.md) **render_model_get_root_transform**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_root_transform)

Returns the root transform of a render model. This is the tracked position relative to our [XROrigin3D](XROrigin3D.md) node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_subaction_paths"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **render_model_get_subaction_paths**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_subaction_paths)

Returns a list of active subaction paths for this `render_model`.

\ **Note:** If different devices are bound to your actions than available in suggested interaction bindings, this information shows paths related to the interaction bindings being mimicked by that device.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_top_level_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **render_model_get_top_level_path**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_top_level_path)

Returns the top level path associated with this `render_model`. If provided this identifies whether the render model is associated with the player's hands or other body part.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_is_animatable_node_visible"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **render_model_is_animatable_node_visible**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md), index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_is_animatable_node_visible)

Returns ``true`` if this animatable node should be visible.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_new_scene_instance"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Node3D](Node3D.md) **render_model_new_scene_instance**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_new_scene_instance)

Returns an instance of a subscene that contains all [MeshInstance3D](MeshInstance3D.md) nodes that allow you to visualize the render model.
